DOC.brief_summary: To investigate pharmacokinetics PF-04776548 follow administration micro-dose PF-04776548 via intravenous oral route .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Investigate The Clearance Of PF-04776548 From The Body Following A Very Low ( Micro ) Dose Of The Compound Using A Low Level Of Radiotracer To Help Quantify Expected Low Concentrations Of PF-04776548 In The Body
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 18 65 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption ( eg , gastrectomy ) . A positive urine drug screen . History regular alcohol consumption exceed 21 drinks/week ( 1 drink = 5 ounce ( 150 mL ) wine 12 ounce ( 360 mL ) beer 1.5 ounce ( 45 mL ) hard liquor ) within 6 month screen . Use tobacco nicotinecontaining product excess equivalent 5 cigarette per day .
